title: Unified metrics model for digital platforms including social media, web analytics, ads, and search performance
description:
DigitalActivityMetrics is a harmonized data model designed to aggregate activity and performance metrics coming from multiple digital platforms, including social media networks (Meta, Instagram, X, YouTube, LinkedIn), web analytics systems (Google Analytics 4), search performance sources (Google Search Console), and advertising platforms (Google Ads, Meta Ads, YouTube Ads, etc.).

This model enables a unified representation of heterogeneous digital metrics?such as impressions, interactions, clicks, conversions, reach, spend, followers, engagement, sessions, and search queries?under a single NGSI-LD entity structure.

id.description: Property. Unique identifier of the DigitalActivityMetrics entity. Must follow a valid URI/URN structure.

type.description: Property. It has to be DigitalActivityMetrics

accountId.description: Property. Identifier of the digital account, such as a Meta Ads account ID, GA4 property ID, YouTube channel ID, X Ads account, GSC site URL, etc.

accountName.description: Property. Human-readable name of the digital account (e.g., page name, channel name, GA4 property name).

platform.description: Relationship. Relationship to the platform entity associated with this metric record. It shall point to an entity of type DigitalNetwork (defined in a separate data model), representing the logical digital platform or ecosystem (e.g., Meta, X, Instagram, YouTube, GA4, Google Ads, Google Search Console, etc.).

publisherPlatform.description: Property. Publishing platform where the metric originates. Useful when a single platform includes multiple sources (e.g., GA4 reporting Search Console or Google Ads data).

ownedBy.description: Relationship. Relationship to the Company entity associated with this metric record. It shall point to an entity of type Company.
